summary: This musical adaptation of the classic tale by Charles Dickens stars Magoo as the cold-hearted old miser, Ebenezer Scrooge.
cast: Jim Backus|Morey Amsterdam|Jack Cassidy|Royal Dano|Paul Frees|Joan Gardner|John Hart|Jane Kean|Marie Matthews|Laura Olsher|Les Tremayne
keywords: a christmas carol|ebenezer scrooge character|mr. magoo character|nearsightedness|adaptation of a christmas carol
title: Mister Magoo's Christmas Carol
